Flickr Export Plugin for iPhoto

Posted on Wednesday, May 11, 2005

Speirs.org :: Flickr Export Plugin for iPhoto

Another sweet iPhoto plugin, interfacing with the cool web application Flickr. You can check out my Flickr photos – I’m still really using Gallery for everything though. Speaking of which, check out iPhotoToGallery.
